rows.label: tlk42400011_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Erm... Has friend seen proper Driver
fighting before?

rows.label: tlk42400011_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Driver use weapon received from Blade
to really bash up enemy slicey-slicey!

rows.label: tlk42400011_01_msg0007
rows.name:
Also, sometimes Driver return
weapon to Blade...

rows.label: tlk42400011_01_msg0003
rows.name:
When that happen, Blade can unleash
powerful attack and flatten enemy!

rows.label: tlk42400011_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Etoto really love it when
Driver and Blade do that!

rows.label: tlk42400011_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Blade left very tired
after doing this though.

rows.label: tlk42400011_01_msg0008
rows.name:
So Driver have to pick up slack and
wave weapon bishy-bashy at enemy.

rows.label: tlk42400011_01_msg0006
rows.name:
A-anyway, this all what boyfriend
teach Etoto!
